data.eml:eml: Database of jumping plant-lice of the families Calophyidae, Carsidaridae, Homotomidae, Phacopteronidae and Triozidae of the Naturhistorisches Museum Basel (NMB) and Muséum d'histoire naturelle Genève (MHNG) - Basel part. Nomenclature is coherent with regard to the Pan-European Species Directory Infrastructure PESI (Fauna Europaea) and the online database Psyl'ist (Catalogue of Life). Geographic coordinates for specimens collected in Switzerland are provided by the Centre Suisse de Cartographie de la Faune.
